reviewText: Subtitles are off from when I watched it online.
Great quality for the price!! I love this anime! Thanks for fast shipping too :D
Not for the fain of heart yaoi-fan but definitely a must see
Love the story. I wish there wad more to it. I will be watching over an over.
story is good , not for teenagers

Its a little hard to get past that the main character looks like he is 13 years old but if you can hold onto that suspension of belief that Ayase is an adult male then you will have fun if you enjoy yaoi.

I found this series online and fell in love with the story line. I wanted a copy for myself because I could not find the books.  I enjoy keeping my friend up to date with the stories, because they want to here what is happening next you will love the story one you see the DVD. I would and have recommended this to everyone (adult).
